Please the packages that you want to be imported automatically when running the configure target in the following folders:

For all demo configurations:
all: will be loaded in author, publish and farm (depending on demo.type)
author: will be loaded in author only
publish: will be loaded in publish only (4503)
farm: will be loaded in farm only (4505) 

Depending on the value of demo.packages (e.g. aem60, aem61â€¦)
all: will be loaded in author, publish and farm (depending on demo.type)
author: will be loaded in author only
publish: will be loaded in publish only (4503)
farm: will be loaded in farm only (4505) 

For a full description of the packages content, please refer to the Wiki page for the AEM Demo machine
